data.title: Binance to Launch Zypher Network Trading Competition with 100 Million POP Token Rewards
data.description:
According to the announcement from Binance, the platform is set to introduce the Zypher Network Trading Competition on Binance Alpha, offering participants the chance to share in 100 million POP tokens. The competition will run from 2025-10-31 16:00 (UTC) to 2025-11-14 16:00 (UTC). During this period, users can trade Zypher Network (POP) through their Binance Wallet (Keyless) or via Binance Alpha to qualify for exclusive token rewards. Participants will be ranked based on their total purchase volume of POP tokens, with the top 12,500 users sharing the token pool equally, receiving 8,000 POP tokens each.

Eligibility for the competition requires users to trade exclusively through Binance Wallet (Keyless) or Binance Alpha, as third-party dApp transactions are excluded. Only cumulative purchases during the campaign are considered, with selling transactions not included. There is no cap on trading volume for participants, and transactions related to token bridging are not eligible. To participate, users must update their Binance App to the latest version, create a Binance Wallet (Keyless), and back it up. After the promotion period ends, rankings will be automatically calculated, and eligible winners can claim their rewards on the event page.

Binance emphasizes that only users from qualified regions who complete account verification (KYC) and hold an active Binance Wallet are eligible. The platform reserves the right to disqualify users involved in dishonest behavior or tampering with program code. Binance also retains the discretion to amend or vary the competition terms without prior notice. All rewards will be distributed in POP tokens, and winners can check their rewards on their Binance Alpha accounts or Binance Wallet (Keyless).

data.title: Morgan Stanley Predicts Gold Prices to Reach $4,500 by Mid-2026 Amid Strong Demand
data.description:
According to PANews, Morgan Stanley announced on Friday that gold prices are expected to rise to $4,500 per ounce by mid-2026, driven by robust demand from ETFs and central banks, alongside ongoing economic uncertainty. Previously, the forecast was set for the latter half of 2026. The financial institution noted in a report that recent movements in gold prices have pushed them into the 'overbought' range on the Relative Strength Index (RSI), but recent corrections have brought them back to healthier levels, potentially clearing market positions.

Morgan Stanley anticipates that as interest rates decline, purchases of gold ETFs will continue, with central banks maintaining their gold acquisitions, albeit at a slower pace, while jewelry demand stabilizes. However, the firm also cautioned about potential downside risks, including possible price volatility that might lead investors to shift to other asset classes or prompt central banks to reduce their gold reserves.

data.title: If Web3 is decentralized, why do DeFi dApps still break when the cloud goes down?
data.description:
On Oct. 20, a hiccup in Amazon’s US-EAST-1 region set off a chain reaction across the crypto industry. Coinbase reported degraded service, Infura and Alchemy posted AWS-related incident notes, and several wallets and rollups began timing out. None of these failures came from the blockchains themselves
source: https://cryptoslate.com/if-web3-is-decentralized-why-do-dapps-break-when-the-cloud-goes-down/

data.title: DGrid AI Secures Seed Funding to Enhance Decentralized AI Network
data.description:
According to Odaily, decentralized AI inference routing network DGrid AI has announced securing seed funding from Waterdrip Capital, IoTeX, Paramita VC, Catcher VC, 4EVER Research, and Abraca Research.

DGrid AI aims to challenge the dominance of centralized AI platforms by leveraging its architecture based on 'AI RPC + LLM inference + distributed nodes.' The network seeks to provide open, reliable, and cost-effective AI capabilities for the Web3 ecosystem. The newly acquired funds will primarily be used for building the node network and expanding partnerships within the ecosystem.

DGrid AI has also revealed plans to initiate a node presale, allowing community members to participate in the decentralized AI network's development by operating nodes. Participants will have the opportunity to benefit from the network's early growth. Details regarding the rules and timeline will be announced through official channels.

data.title: AI Startup Humans& Seeks $1 Billion Funding with $5 Billion Valuation
data.description: According to PANews, former xAI researcher Eric Zelikman is establishing a new AI startup named Humans&. The venture is being co-founded with researchers from Google, Meta, Anthropic, OpenAI, and DeepMind, aiming to raise $1 billion with an estimated valuation of approximately $5 billion. The company plans to develop AI systems capable of remembering and responding to individual preferences, emphasizing human-machine collaboration. This new training paradigm is expected to require more computational power than current mainstream methods. Among the co-founders are early Google employee Georges Harik, Stanford professor Noah Goodman, and Andi Peng, who previously worked on post-training and behavior reinforcement at Anthropic. Humans& has not yet disclosed its product plans.

data.title: U.S. Stock Market Opens Higher Amid Strong Tech Performances
data.description: According to PANews, the U.S. stock market opened higher on October 31, 2025, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average rising by 0.07%, the S&P 500 increasing by 0.7%, and the Nasdaq Composite climbing by 1.5%. Amazon's shares surged by 12% following its third-quarter performance, which exceeded expectations and marked the fastest growth in cloud services in three years. Apple saw a 2% increase in its stock price, reaching a new high as its fourth-quarter revenue set a historical record for the same period, with optimistic forecasts for the next fiscal quarter. Nvidia's shares rose by 1.7% after the company secured an agreement with South Korean firms to supply over 260,000 AI chips. Reddit experienced a significant jump of 12.8% in its stock price after the company raised its fourth-quarter performance expectations. Amazon's market value increased by nearly $300 billion following its opening surge.

data.title: Prenetics Expands Bitcoin Holdings Following Recent Fundraising
data.description: According to PANews, Prenetics, a health science company backed by David Beckham, has announced the acquisition of 100 additional Bitcoins at approximately $109,594 each. This purchase was made possible through a recent $44 million stock fundraising completed on October 28. The company now holds a total of 378 Bitcoins, valued at around $41 million, contributing to its overall liquidity of approximately $127 million, which includes $86 million in cash and $41 million in Bitcoin, with zero debt.Prenetics has stated its commitment to purchasing one Bitcoin daily and plans to increase acquisitions when market conditions are favorable.
